ing.item: BY 4 1/2 BY 4 1/8-INCH LOAF-TYPE PAN TEMPERATURE: 350 F. OVEN

directions.step:
1. PREPARE MIX ACCORDING TO INSTRUCTIONS ON CONTAINER.
2. POUR 1 LB 8 OZ BATTER EVENLY INTO EACH UNGREASED PAN. DO NOT FILL MORE THAN 2/3 FULL.
3. BAKE 35-40 MINUTES OR UNTIL CRUST IS GOLDEN BROWN. INVERT PANS; COOL AT LEAST 1 HOUR.
4. FROST IF DESIRED. CUT 13 SLICES PER LOAF.
Recipe Number: G00100
SERVING SIZE: 1 PIECE
From the <Army Master Recipe Index File> (actually used today!). Downloaded from Glen's MM Recipe Archive, http://www.erols.com/hosey.
